    • Fitting synthetic data using epidp

epidp

The goal of epidp is to allow covariate information to inform estimates of the time-varying reproduction number, RtR_t.

Installation

You can install the released version of epidp with:

devtools::install_github(ben18785/epidp)

Example

Generate simulated data

library(epidp)
## basic example code

Contributing guidelines

We welcome contributions from collaborators. Before doing so, we ask that you read our contributing guidelines section.
